events.title: Michigan Postcards to Defend the Democratic House Majority
events.description:
Help us make sure Democrats hold the House majority and potentially expand it this November by writing postcard to rally Democrats to vote in 41 competitive House races from California to Maine this November, including three House districts in Michigan: MI-03 (Scholten), MI-07 (Slotkin), MI-08 (Kildee). Our goal is to send 6 million postcards, so we need your help!

You'll need to provide your own postcards and stamps for this program. We recommend https://progressivepostcards.ourproshop.com, an online store that sells postcards with several of our designs for less than most sellers. 

After you sign up, we'll email you a list of voters and instructions, which will include an October mailing date and three message options.

Click the "Take me to the sign up" button to go to the full sign-up page. 

Postcards to Swing States is a project of Progressive Turnout Project. For more information, visit us at turnoutpac.org/postcards or send us an email.

events.title: Knocking Doors in Ann Arbor!
events.description: Join us to knock on doors to get voters engaged and excited early this year for the Midterm Elections! Let's canvass together to remind voters about the importance of this upcoming election and to make sure we elect Democrats up and down the ballot this November!

events.title: Knocking Doors in Ypsi!
events.description: Join us to knock on doors to get voters engaged and excited early this year for the Midterm Elections! Let's canvass together to remind voters about the importance of this upcoming election and to make sure we elect Democrats up and down the ballot this November!

events.title: September Canvassing with Conlin
events.description: join staff and volunteers to canvass the newly drawn 48th House District!

events.title: Jackson County Democracy Canvass Launch
events.description:
Come on out to knock doors with Voters Not Politicians! We will be talking to voters about the importance of voting in the midterm election, our endorsed pro-democracy candidates, and Proposal 2 (Promote The Vote 2022).

You'll need your own transportation, comfortable walking shoes, and a fully charged smartphone. Please download MiniVan in advance of the start time, training will begin at the start of the event. Additional materials will be provided upon sign up.

If any of these are not possible, please contact the event organizer, at least 24 hours before the event start time, for assistance. We will be going out in pairs.

events.title: Canvass with Jennifer Conlin, Team Debbie Dingell, and MI Rep. Julie Rogers
events.description:
Join Jennifer Conlin, Team Debbie Dingell, Julie Rogers, volunteers, and staff as we knock on doors in the area! Food, supplies, and beverages will be provided, snacks are encouraged. Working cell phones with service and charged battery are also highly encouraged.

Our goal is to speak with as many neighbors as possible about our campaign and what is at stake, sign up today and forward the event to friends and family!

events.title: Reproductive Freedom for All Canvass in Ypsilanti
events.description:
On June 24, 2022, the US Supreme Court overturned Roe v. Wade, and as a result a 1931 Michigan law that makes almost all abortions a crime, even in cases of rape and incest, could go back into effect. Reproductive Freedom for All made history when it submitted more than 730,000 signatures to qualify for the November 2022 ballot. 

We are on a mission to talk to as many voters as possible to motivate them to vote YES on Proposal 3. In person conversations are the most effective way to motivate someone to vote. We believe that passionate volunteers who are from the community are the best possible advocates for Reproductive Freedom for All, and that voters are more likely to listen to you than anyone else. 

Join us for a canvass where we'll talk to voters about the importance of voting YES on Proposal 3.

events.title: Canvassing in Chelsea!
events.description: Join team Imhoff in knocking on doors and talking with voters about the 46th district and flipping the house blue!

events.title: Clipboarding @ UM
events.description: Come Join us at the University of Michigan to engage as many new students as we can! Please select the day and time that works for you and details will be provided for your shift.

events.title: Dorm Storm Weekends @ EMU
events.description: Come join us on Weekends to canvass EMU Dorms and speak with students.

events.title: Write Letters and Postcards to Voters with A2D2 Swing Left!
events.description:
Join us on the evening of Wednesday, September 21st, as we write to voters! 
 
Work with **Vote Forward** to write to a infrequent voters and tell them why you are a voter. Receipt of a personally addressed letter with a clear message is shown to increase voter turnout. 

Or write postcards to Michigan Dems in important Congressional Districts with **Postcards to Swing States**.

RSVP here, and weâ€™ll let you know how to join this party. Invite your friends, too.   

Think about it: if you help get a voter to the polls, that is an important step towards creating a more inclusive and equitable government and society. 

Looking forward to seeing you!

events.title: Maurice Imhoff's Fundraiser in Chelsea
events.description: This election is more important than ever, and the 46th State House seat is key to a Democratic majority. Please join us to support Maurice Imhoff as the official 46th State House Democratic candidate, and hear from Leader Donna Lasinski.

events.title: Washtenaw County Canvass
events.description: Join us as we connect with voters in Washtenaw county. Launch location provided upon sign-up.
